Title: Pilot
Plot: A newcomer coach Eric Taylor finds himself helming a promising high school football team, the Dillon Panthers, that has a real chance to make it to the top.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Louanne Stephens, Brad Leland, Derek Phillips, Cindy Creekmore, Noble Chase Pack, Kate Krause, John Hambrick, Matthew Greer, Libby Villari
